segments.text: Mary , I've some bad news for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have already known that . I didn't get the scholarship , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The board was favorably impressed with your application , but the competition was very fierce .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you help me ? You know I do need the scholarship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid I can't I advise you to try again next year .
segments.speaker: S1
